Oh Sod It Italian Domain Names International

10 Jan 2000

After a good while protecting the integrity of the .it namespace, any VAT-registered business in the EU will be able to register Italian domain names from 15th Jan.

\nAccording to the story at TheRegister, the names will go on sale at #100 initially, from VI.

\nSo much for the idea of knowing where a company or org is based from the domain name - another country bites the dust.

\nbugger.it
